upcoming.name: GDG Port of Spain - Women Techmakers TT IWD Summit 2020
upcoming.description:
ABOUT THE SUMMIT

DATE: Saturday 18th April, 2020
TIME: 9AM to 5PM
VENUE: Government Campus Plaza Auditorium

Our Inaugural Women Techmakers IWD (International Women's Day) Summit will provide an innovative and dynamic environment for the promotion and exchange of STEM and Digital Career and Personal Development Knowledge that will include:

- #IamRemarkable Workshop - by Google

- Core training in workshops curated by Google in critical and competitive skill sets to advance our local community;

- The examination of best practices in the areas of Inclusion, Diversity and Mental Health within the Technology industry

- Panel discussion on the psychological and cultural workplace barriers experienced in implementing inclusion and diversity

- Introduction to Mindfulness as a professional practice to enhance wellness and competitiveness

- Lightning Talks featuring innovators and influencers and their projects

THEME

Women Techmakers Trinidad and Tobago has chosen as our International Women's Day Summit theme, "Seat at the Table".

Our primary objective this year is to build our community's capacity to compete and progress in this rapidly growing industry where women are poised to play a significant role in our region's impact on the global market, and take their seat at the table in the design and implementation of our economic and technological future.

WHO SHOULD COME

We are hoping to engage a strong core community of women techmakers alongside gender friendly participation from the following groups:

Existing Women Techmakers Members
Existing GDG Port of Spain Members
Corporate Executives
Educators
HR Managers
STEM employers
STEM Managers
STEM employees
Engineers
Architects/Technical Drawing
STEM students - high school & university]
Aspiring techmakers
Women STEMpreneurs
Digital Artists & Designers
Animators and Editors
Developers
Production Studios
Media Professionals
Gender Equity Stakeholder Representatives
Gender Parity Stakeholder Representatives
Civil Society Leaders
Tech Leadership/Membership

To reach us please email [masked]
or call us at[masked]

upcoming.name: GDG-POS Firebase Study Jam
upcoming.description:
Want to get started building web apps? Learn how to do that with Firebase!

Join GDG Port of Spain on Saturday 25th April, 2020 from 10AM to 3PM for our GDG POS Firebase Study Jam!

Firebase is Googleâ€™s mobile app development platform for iOS, Android, and mobile web developers.
Firebase gives you functionality like analytics, databases, messaging and crash reporting so you can move quickly and focus on your users.

Firebase Study Jams for Web are a great opportunity to bring members of our community together to learn how to develop web apps using some of Firebase's newly launched features for web development.

Study Jams are also study groups organized by Google Developer Groups (GDG) worldwide. In these study groups, the attendees get personal tutoring by coaches. This Study Jam is on the firebase platform for web applications.

DATE & TIME
Saturday 25th April, 2020

VENUE
This is now a digital event! This means we can now open participation to a global audience! RSVP for streaming links.

LEARNING CLASS:
Beginner
New To Javascript? Here an introductory code lab: https://gdgpos.com/labs/js-intro/#0

AGENDA:

Learn how to:

Host a web application for free with firebase hosting
Set up performance monitoring on your web app.
Add automated email notifications in a web app.
Allow users to login with gmail/facebook on your app.

Visit https://firebase.google.com/ for more info on firebase.

WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW BEFORE THIS TRAINING EVENT:

We would like to recommend you take some time to know about Javascript before joining us for this tutorial. This is a class for Beginners, however, we want you to make the MOST out of this learning opportunity.

Please message us anytime at [masked] for any questions or concerns about this event.

Stay Tuned for more details!!
See you online soon!
